summary: Derrick and some of his college buddies plan a small Get2Gether for couples only, in hopes for Derrick to finally have an intimate moment with his new girlfriend Reashon. The only problem ... See full synopsis »
cast: Mitchell Bisschop|Brandall Cole|Deon Cole|Michael Colyar|Tiffany J. Curtis|Kid Capri|Eric Lane|Simply Marvalous|Gerald McQuirter|Tony T. Roberts|J. David Shanks|Mark Simmons
title: A Get2Gether
